body.p: There is a vacancy in the office of Justice of the Peace in the 6t Civil District in this County, accasioned by the removal from the state of A. M. Holloway Esqr. I take the liberty of recommending to your Excellency Thomas A Slayden, as being a gentleman well qualified and suited to the position, and would give satisfaction if you shall see fit to appoint,

Your obt Servt
A R Boon Judge
Graves Co Ct

Graves Co
J. P.
Dist No 6.
T. A Slayden
